modules.name: The_Pumpkin_Kings_Curse
modules.author: MoonlightByte
modules.description: A cursed harvest moon rises over Hollowfen, and the dreaded Pumpkin King awakens. Navigate haunted fields, creeping graveyards, and a living mansion to break the curse before the final midnight bell tolls.
features: Multi-phase boss encounter with environmental hazards
Rich exploration with optional side quests
